version_description:
- Adds French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish and Simplified Chinese localzations
- Minor bug fixes

- Adds search feature for iPad
- Improves time format for different countries
- Minor bug fixes

- Adjust add button
- Minor bug fixes

- Supports weekly budgets
- Minor bug fixes

-Introduce Parse to sync data between devices.
-Minor bugs fix.

Fixes crash issue if you have Dropbox account linked in earlier version before and upgrade to v5.5. It is highly recommended that upgrade this version to fix it.

Please don't worry about your data, they are still persisted by the app. You can also restore your data from Dropbox in settings if you have your app removed.

We are sorry for the inconvenience and confusion. Please feel free to contact us if you have any problem.

-Minor bug fixes.
-Compatible for iOS9.

-Minor bug fixes.
-Compatible for iOS9.

-Brand new look and feel.
-TouchID for app access.
-Facebook account for login to Parse.
-Minor bug fixes.
-Hotfix for crashing at launch.

A large number of bugs fixed
-Data was cut in exported PDF.
-Duplicated records for default account.
-Missing icon when add new account.
-Crashes after login.
-Wrong buttons were shown for Left/Spent.
-Additional records were generated for repeats.
-Hard to tab Setting button.
-Statistics error for net worth.
-Transactions were covered in calendar view after purchasing full version.
-More minor bugs fixed.

-Compatible for IOS10.
-Minor bug fixes.

-Performance optimized
-Stability improved
-Bugs caused crash fixed

The recent update changed some logics of data syncing to level up the data security and network connection speed so that there maybe a little differences on behaviour such as data gone. Please don't worry about them, they will be back soon after you login successfully based on the scale of your data. Anyway, please feel free to use Expense and don't be hesitate to contact us if you meet with any problem.

-Fixed login issue with facebook account.
-Keyboard layout adjusted.

- iOS 13 Dark Mode support
Go easy on your eyes with Dark Mode

- Minor bug fixes

- Fixed subcategory statistics issue
- Fixed transaction sorting issue
- Fixed time display issue in exported CSV file

- Compatible with iOS 12
- Support add transaction in widget
- Minor bug fixes

-Fix a crash bug occurred occasionally on iPad.
-Speed up the app launch speed.
-Reduce the show rate of Ads.

- Optimize purchased user ui display
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Data issue fixes
- Fixed an issue where some premium users may change back to free user

- All-new design iPad version
- Real time sync
- Optimize budgets page
- Bug fixes

- Data issue fixes
- Fixed an issue where the calendar was displayed incorrectly
Bug fixes

- Fixed crash in iOS13
- Data issue fixes

- Fixed an issue in budget calculation
- Fixed an issue in calculator
- Payee's sorting in widget is changed to sort by frequency of used
- Fixed an issue in chart
- Other bug fixes

- iOS 13 Dark Mode support
Go easy on your eyes with Dark Mode

- Minor bug fixes

- Bug fixes in Chart and Export Report
- Provides 1 week free trial for new subscribers

- Bug fixes in Chart and Export Report
- Provides 1 week free trial for new subscribers

This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you haver any questions or run into any trouble – please contact us at expense@support.polycents.com and we’ll be glad to help you.
